ItemBGDesc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this {TEXTJOIN#61}, glowing with iridescent and otherworldly light, is no ordinary item.\nIn actuality, it is fitted with some LEDs in there. They light up if you press the switch. (Hold down the switch and the weapon will play a sound that says "Villain! Prepare to die!".)
